name: kifiapp-root
description: Root management for TaniTrack Hatchery Management System

scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
